title: Glorious
writer: Todd Rigney, Joshua Hull, David Ian McKendry
actors: Ryan Kwanten, J.K. Simmons, Sylvia Grace Crim
plot: After a breakup, Wes ends up at a remote rest stop. He finds himself locked inside the bathroom with a mysterious figure speaking from an adjacent stall. Soon Wes realizes he is involved in a situation more terrible than he could ...
